jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Transport team owns the complete journey of a rider right from selecting pickup until the point he/she is dropped off safely. We currently support bikes and cars as the transportation medium in 4 countries — Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam and Thailand. Transport accounts for most number of transactions amongst all Gojek services.

Despite this scale we are still very early in our journey. You will join our iOS team and help us in taking Ride Hailing to the next level. Here are a few facts about our app and codebase:

1) Our codebase is 100% Swift
2) We completely redesigned our app in 2018. Read about how we did it in this blog
3) We’ve expanded to 3 new countries in the last 1 year. More coming soon
4) We’ve got a kick ass design team which you’ll enjoy working with. Check out our Design Language System called Asphalt which you’ll be using and contributing to

We currently support bikes and cars as the transportation medium in 4 countries — Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam and Thailand. Transport accounts for most number of transactions amongst all Gojek services.

Despite this scale we are still very early in our journey. You will join our iOS team and help us in taking Ride Hailing to the next level. Here are a few facts about our app and codebase:

1) Our codebase is 100% Swift
2) We completely redesigned our app in 2018. Read about how we did it in this blog

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Build and deploy features iteratively in production
  • Work cross-functionally with product, engineering and design teams across Gojek
  • Collaborate with internal teams to build and iterate on features
  • Build delightful user-facing experiences with smooth performance
  • Mentor and provide feedback to colleagues, participate in organization building
  • Participate in research trips to better understand the aspirations and pain points of our customers

• Based out of or willing to relocate to Bangalore or Jakarta
  • Deep understanding of the iOS frameworks like UIKit, Foundation, etc
  • Experience developing iOS apps in Swift
  • Attention to detail, particularly around software engineering fundamentals, testing methodologies, and quality
  • A strong customer focus
